name: Kai no Bouken - The Quest of Ki [NES]
description:
"ki" is an arcade game developed by me i.e. DANIELTHEGAMER HD... the aim of this game is to collect blue orbs (good ki) and destroy red orbs (evil ki)... be careful if you destroy blue orbs or get touched by red orbs you will lose a life...if you lose 3 lives you lose

TUTORIAL

pc:

left arrow to go left

right arrow to go right

MOBILE:

Press left or right to move

.................................................. ......

this is one of my first games... i think if i had the money i would grow even more... so if you liked the game donate something, a little help never hurts... if you have any advice write in the comments I will try to answer everyone
